description: This file defines a function `fetchCourses` that retrieves paginated course data from a backend API, supporting filtering by a search term. It uses an imported `apiRequest` function to perform the HTTP request.

methods.name: fetchCourses({ page = 1, limit = 12, search = '' } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of courses from the backend API, with optional filters for page number, limit, and search term.
